data.title: Primitives again
data.body:
Modified the matrice calcs to work correctly, 
Added blend states for XNA 4.0, 
Added graphics extensions for Blend state to OGL states, 
Set blending mode in Graphics device before drawing primitives.  
Also added graphics state blend mode setup in SpriteBatch for testing.

data.title: Mods for Mac Basic Effect and Windows GamePad
data.body:
Added a shader for Basic Vector and No Fog, 
Added support for Matrix value setting in EffectParameters
add GamePadd modifications for Windows to allow to run without SDL installed.

This also adds more Basic Effect modifications for Matrices.

Adds CullMode support and FillMode support so the samples and test are now working.  It is closer!!!

data.title: Removed KeyboardState from Android and use the one in /Input, as they are identical.
data.body:
Also...
Make PresentationParameters more XNA4 compatible and allow BloomComponent to compile.

data.title: Converted the Android Update loop to a for loop as suggested.
BasicEffect
data.body: Restructure BasicEffect to make it XNA 4.0 as per Microsofts BasicEffects files.  Only modified Mac side of BasicEffect so it might need to be applied to the base which I think it can be instead of Mac only.

data.title: Change method signature for DrawUserIndexedPrimitive
data.body: The method signature was different from that specified in the documentation on XNA 4.0 site

data.title: Revert Effect back to original
data.body: Vector Rumble now runs

data.title: Refactored BasicEffect and Effect classes under MacOS. Tidied up Effect.cs under iOS-Android
GamePad Enhancements
data.body: Add missing GamePadType class. modifications to allow to run if SDL is not installed and added a minimal autoconfig class for testing purposes.

data.title: Changes to fix DrawUserPrimitives to work under iOS and Android
data.body: These changes tidy up BasicEffect and Effect constructors and brings them more in line with XNA 4, but also implements the Clone methods.

data.title: Android Orientation Changes
data.body:
I've reworked the Android code to handle orientation changes better (although it still needs work).

Note that the SpriteBatch now has some #ifdef ANDROID code in it. This is because the Width and Height properties do not need to be switched when calling GL.Orth unlike it does in iOS.

data.title: Gamepad Modifications
data.body: Ragath's modifications to fix a few little problems with first attempt

data.title: Develop
data.body: updated the GamePad.cs files

data.title: Changes to support DrawUserPrimitives and to fix Sound on Android and Defaulting to Landscape mode
data.body: Based on suggestions from Scott Dancer, Warren Burch and an observation that Defaulting to Landscape wasn't working correctly, I put forth these changes.

data.title: Add missing references to Mac solution so it will compile
Develop
data.body: Gamepad support implemented for Win/Lin/OSX.

data.title: Add Location getter on Rectangle class
data.body: - improves XNA compatability

data.title: Gamepad system
data.body: Implemented SDL-based gamepad system for Win/Lin/OSX.

data.title: Initial DrawPrimitives port
data.body: The draw primitives do not work yet but at least there are no errors when using them

data.title: Changes to support the CurveReader ContentTypeReader across platforms.
data.body: Compile under iOS, Android and Mac, but till need double checking on Windows and Linux.

data.title: Fixed loading of certain WAVs
data.body: Some wavs have extra data before the actual WAV Data. Instead of throwing an error, read the content till we get to the correct data.

data.title: Fix issues with FullScreen toggle and cursor hiding
data.body: Finally got it working.

data.title: This hopefully merges the ReadMe.md back to master
Fixed Linux window resize
data.body: When applying changes on a GraphicsDeviceManager, the window wouldn't get resized to the new size.

data.title: This change at least allows the iOS side to compile.
data.body: Texture2D : Changed Apply method in Android version to be internal, added Apply method to iOS port.

data.title: Fix for IsAllowUserResizing not being recognized when set int Game creation
data.body: Fix problem with IsAllowUserResizing not being recognized on startup when it is set on Game creation.
